mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(r.id) tradeTotal, SUM(r.amount) amountTotal, r.terminal_number terminalNumber, r.pay_channel_id payChannelId, r.trade_type_id tradeTypeId FROM trade_records r WHERE r.trade_type_id = #{tradeTypeId} and r.traded_status=2 AND r.terminal_number = #{terminalNumber} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.traded_at, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
SELECT IFNULL(( SELECT SUM(amount) amountTotal FROM trade_records WHERE traded_status = 2 and agent_id=#{id}),0)

SELECT SUM(t.amount) as tread_sum, count(t.id) as tread_num,DATE(t.created_at) as riqi FROM trade_records t WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(),t.created_at)<8 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),t.created_at)>0 and t.customer_id= #{customer_id} GROUP BY riqi ORDER BY riqi DESC
